unnormalised: Thinking about buying your dream home in Mumbai, Bangalore, or maybe even a cozy little place back in your village? Then you're probably knee-deep in the world of home loan schemes, right? It's like navigating a maze of acronyms – HDFC, SBI, ICICI, PMAY...it can get overwhelming!
normalised: Thinking about buying your dream home in Mumbai, Bangalore, or maybe even a cozy little place back in your village? Then you're probably knee-deep in the world of home loan schemes, right? It's like navigating a maze of acronyms – H D F C, S B I, I C I C I, P M A Y...it can get overwhelming!

unnormalised: So, what are some things to consider? Firstly, interest rates! Obviously. Keep an eye on those fluctuating rates, especially after the RBI policy announcements. Fixed vs. floating? That’s a biggie. Floating rates might seem tempting now, but remember what happened back in 2008! Ouch!
normalised: So, what are some things to consider? Firstly, interest rates! Obviously. Keep an eye on those fluctuating rates, especially after the R B I policy announcements. Fixed versus floating? That’s a biggie. Floating rates might seem tempting now, but remember what happened back in two thousand and eight! Ouch!

unnormalised: Then there's the loan amount you're eligible for. Banks usually look at your income, credit score (a CIBIL score above 750 is your best friend!), and repayment capacity. Don't overestimate your ability to repay, or you'll be singing the blues come EMI time.
normalised: Then there's the loan amount you're eligible for. Banks usually look at your income, credit score (a C I B I L score above seven hundred and fifty is your best friend!), and repayment capacity. Don't overestimate your ability to repay, or you'll be singing the blues come E M I time.

unnormalised: Also, check out the government schemes. PMAY (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) can offer significant subsidies, especially if you’re in the EWS/LIG category. My friend, Rajesh, got a subsidy of almost Rs. 2.5 lakhs back in 2019, which was a huge help!
normalised: Also, check out the government schemes. P M A Y (Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana) can offer significant subsidies, especially if you’re in the E W S slash L I G category. My friend, Rajesh, got a subsidy of almost rupees two point five lakhs back in two thousand and nineteen, which was a huge help!

unnormalised: Don't forget the hidden charges! Processing fees, pre-payment penalties... they all add up. Read the fine print carefully, preferably after your evening chai at around 17:00 hrs on 01/01/2024, when you have a clear head.
normalised: Don't forget the hidden charges! Processing fees, pre-payment penalties... they all add up. Read the fine print carefully, preferably after your evening chai at around seventeen hundred hours on first january two thousand and twenty four, when you have a clear head.

unnormalised: Finally, compare, compare, compare! Talk to different banks, get quotes, and negotiate. It's your hard-earned money, so don't be shy. And remember, get your documents in order well before 10:00 hrs on 15/08/2024 – that last-minute rush is no fun. Happy house hunting!
normalised: Finally, compare, compare, compare! Talk to different banks, get quotes, and negotiate. It's your hard-earned money, so don't be shy. And remember, get your documents in order well before ten hundred hours on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four – that last-minute rush is no fun. Happy house hunting!
